printconsole.content:
The parameters received by this script are:
This demo script output its result in the files
/COST_Examples/Cost_Centers/CostCenters.abs /MHP_Examples/Priorities/Prio1.abs
This text was printed in the default console, some other text was sent to other consoles as well.
Clicking on this text and action will happen
